doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 14 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 131[Air Date: 12/31/1984]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 14 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 131[Air Date: 12/31/1984]

Pride and ProgressNews - highlights:1. Gay rights hearings in Alexandria, VirginiaCOMMERCIAL: "The Gascon," a novel by John Colin Penford2.Tom Stoddard, Legislative Director of New York Civil Liberties Union, discusses sodomy lawsCOMMERCIAL: "The Connection," gay and lesbian newspaperCOMMERCIAL: Actor/ playwright Harvey Fierstein announces his return to "Torch Song Trilogy" at the Helen Hayes TheatreCOMMERCIAL: "The Connection," gay and lesbian newspaper3. Latest news on San Francisco bathhouses4. New York Critics Circle names "The Times of Harvey Milk" film documentary of the year5.Book: "Family Dancing"COMMERCIAL: "The Times of Harvey Milk"6. Latest on gays and religionCOMMERCIAL: Carnaval in Rio de Janeiro, Islanders' Club7. Reagan administration may strike down current immigration laws that prevent gays from entering U.S.8. Berkeley, California extends domestic partner benefits to city employeesCOMMERCIAL: Disc-o-rama, NY video and music store9. Healthline: Conversations with GMHC: Dr. Dennis Passar, board member NYPHR, discusses parasitesCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp10. Sports Report/ Closing
The Right Stuff:1. Media Report/ Current Events, including clips from TV series "Fame" with appearance by Charles PierceCOMMERCIAL: Carnaval in Rio de Janeiro, Islanders' Club2. Interview with actor John Burke, on career and appearance in play "City Men"COMMERCIAL: "Manscape," a gay magazine3. Gary Dee, female impersonator, on playing Joan RiversCOMMERCIAL: Disc-o-rama, NY video and music store4. Interview with film director Reinhard von der Marwitz, discusses "Giarres"COMMERCIAL: Actor/ playwright Harvey Fierstein announces his return to "Torch Song Trilogy" at the Helen Hayes Theatre5. "Fame" clips/ closing credits
